title: Embroidermodder
symbols_docstring: Symbols use the SVG path syntax.
In theory, we could combine the icons and symbols systems,
since they could be rendered once and stored as icons in Qt.
Also we want to render the patterns themselves using SVG
syntax, so it would save on repeated work overall.

Save as.tooltip: Save the design under a new name.

Day.tooltip: Updates the current view using day vision settings.

Night.tooltip: Updates the current view using night vision settings.

Zoom Window.tooltip: Sets the toolbar icon size to 16x16.

Zoom Dynamic.tooltip: Sets the toolbar icon size to 24x24.

Pan Real Time.tooltip: Sets the toolbar icon size to 16x16.

Pan Point.tooltip: Sets the toolbar icon size to 24x24.

Icon 16.tooltip: Sets the toolbar icon size to 16x16.

Icon 24.tooltip: Sets the toolbar icon size to 24x24.

Changelog.tooltip: Opens a log of what has recently changed.

About.tooltip: Opens the about this software dialog.

keys.OBJ_COLOR: TODO: Use color chart in formats/format-dxf.h for this

tips: you can change the color of the display through settings?
you can hide the scrollbars to increase the viewable area through settings?
you can change the icon size for increased visibility?
you can toggle the grid on and off by pressing the button in the statusbar?
the grid size can be changed to match your hoop size through settings?
the crosshair size is based on a percentage of your screen size? Setting it to 100 may help you visually line things up better.
you can pan by pressing the middle mouse button and dragging your mouse across the screen?
you can open and edit multiple designs simultaneously?
that many embroidery machines support the .dst format?
that you can zoom in and out using your mouse wheel?
that you can use circular and isometric grids?
about our command line format converter?
that you can use the 'DAY' and 'NIGHT' commands to quickly switch the  view colors to commonly used white or black?
that you can quickly change the background, crosshair and grid colors using the 'RGB' command?

to_translate: # NOTE: Allow this enum to evaluate false
# NOTE: Allow this enum to evaluate false and true
# NOTE: Allow this enum to evaluate false
# NOTE: Allow this enum to evaluate false

quickleader.statustip: Creates a leader and annotation: QUICKLEADER

rgb.statustip: Updates the current view colors: RGB

move.statustip: Displaces objects a specified distance in a specified direction: MOVE

rotate.tooltip: Rotates objects about a base point: ROTATE

sandbox.tooltip: A sandbox to play in: SANDBOX

scale.tooltip: Enlarges or reduces objects proportionally in the X, Y, and Z directions: SCALE

cut.statustip: Cut the current selection's contents to the clipboard.

copy.statustip: Copy the current selection's contents to the clipboard.

paste.statustip: Paste the clipboard's contents into the current selection.

redo.statustip: Reverses the effects of the previous undo action.

windownext.statustip: Move the focus to the next window.

windowprevious.statustip: Move the focus to the previous window.

changelog.tooltip: Describes new features in this product.

tipoftheday.statustip: Displays a dialog with useful tips

icon32.statustip: Sets the toolbar icon size to 32x32.

icon48.statustip: Sets the toolbar icon size to 48x48.

icon64.statustip: Sets the toolbar icon size to 64x64.

icon128.statustip: Sets the toolbar icon size to 128x128.

settings_dialog.statustip: Configure settings specific to this product.

make_layer_current.statustip: Makes the layer of a selected object the active layer

layers.statustip: Manages layers and layer properties: LAYER

layer_selector.statustip: Dropdown selector for changing the current layer

layerprevious.statustip: Restores the previous layer settings: LAYERP

colorselector.statustip: Dropdown selector for changing the current thread color

linetypeselector.statustip: Dropdown selector for changing the current stitch type

lineweightselector.statustip: Dropdown selector for changing the current thread weight

hidealllayers.statustip: Turns the visibility off for all layers in the current drawing: HIDEALL

showalllayers.statustip: Turns the visibility on for all layers in the current drawing: SHOWALL

freezealllayers.statustip: Freezes all layers in the current drawing:  FREEZEALL

thawalllayers.statustip: Thaws all layers in the current drawing: THAWALL

lockalllayers.statustip: Locks all layers in the current drawing: LOCKALL

unlockalllayers.statustip: Unlocks all layers in the current drawing:  UNLOCKALL

textstrikeout.statustip: Sets text to be striked out.

zoomrealtime.statustip: Zooms to increase or decrease the apparent size of objects in the current viewport.

zoomprevious.statustip: Zooms to display the previous view.

zoomwindow.statustip: Zooms to display an area specified by a rectangular window.

zoomdynamic.statustip: Zooms to display the generated portion of the drawing.

zoomscale.statustip: Zooms the display using a specified scale factor.

zoomcenter.statustip: Zooms to display a view specified by a center point and  magnification or height.

zoomin.statustip: Zooms to increase the apparent size of objects.

zoomout.statustip: Zooms to decrease the apparent size of objects.

zoom_selected.statustip: Zooms to display the selected objects.

zoom_all.statustip: Zooms to display the drawing extents or the grid limits.

zoom_extents.statustip: Zooms to display the drawing extents.

panrealtime.statustip: Moves the view in the current viewport.

panpoint.statustip: Moves the view by the specified distance.

panleft.statustip: Moves the view to the left.

panright.statustip: Moves the view to the right.

distance.statustip: Measures the distance and angle between two points: DIST

erase.statustip: Removes objects from a drawing: DELETE

locatepoint.statustip: Displays the coordinate values of a location:  ID

platform.statustip: List which platform is in use: PLATFORM
